![](pa-groundwater-2024.jpg)

This dataset is a subset of the Shale Network database and includes all groundwater samples from Pennsylvania in the Shale Network database as of September 2024. [Click this link](https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.est.4c03371){target="_blank"} to access the corresponding peer-reviewed article that interprets the dataset. In addition, the dataset can be downloaded via this [data DOI](https://doi.org/10.26208/DT5Y-5B37){target="_blank"}.
